mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(orderNum, memberIdx, detailNum) VALUES (orders_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{detailNum})
INSERT INTO orderDetail(orderNum, count, uMileage, pay, state, oDate, cDate) VALUES (orders_seq.CURRVAL, #{count}, #{uMileage}, #{pay}, 0, SYSDATE, #{classDate})
mapper.select: SELECT le.classNum, le.className, detailNum, count AS count1, TO_CHAR(classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') classDate, le.price, le.mileage, m1.userName FROM lessonDetail ld JOIN lesson le ON ld.classNum = le.classNum JOIN member m ON m.memberIdx = le.memberIdx JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx WHERE TO_CHAR(classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{classDate} AND le.classNum = #{classNum}

SELECT le.classNum, le.className, detailNum, count AS count1, TO_CHAR(classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') classDate, le.price, le.mileage, discountMoney, discountPercent FROM lessonDetail ld JOIN lesson le ON ld.classNum = le.classNum JOIN eventClass ec ON le.classNum = ec.classNum JOIN event e ON ec.eventNum = e.eventNum WHERE TO_CHAR(classDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') = #{classDate} AND le.classNum = #{classNum}

SELECT m1.userId, m1.userName, TO_CHAR(m2.birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, m1.totalMileage, m.memberIdx FROM member1 m1 JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId JOIN member m ON m1.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE lessonDetail SET count = count - #{count} WHERE detailNum = #{detailNum}
UPDATE member1 SET totalMileage = totalMileage - #{uMileage} WHERE userId = #{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET totalMileage = totalMileage + #{mileage} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mileage(mNum, point, mDate, mState, orderNum, userId) VALUES (mileage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mileage}, SYSDATE, 0, orders_seq.CURRVAL, #{userId})
INSERT INTO mileage(mNum, point, mDate, mState, orderNum, userId) VALUES (mileage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{uMileage}, SYSDATE, 1, orders_seq.CURRVAL, #{userId})
